raw_body: Called to rest 9th May, 2024. Precious son of (Late) Earnest Perumal, (Late) Rani Perumal, beloved husband of Rathini Perumal, loving father of Roanne and Rehan, father-in-law of Prasanna and Jenny, brother of Indira Fernandopulle, Ellsworth Perumal, Tyrell Perumal and Ingrid Bapapulle.
